project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through rooms, pick up items, view inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Design game architecture and room layout
Implement item picking and inventory management
Create simple challenges that players can encounter
Write tests for room navigation, item handling, and challenge mechanics
Execute tests to ensure all functionalities work as intended
